Summary •	IT Manager with technical experience in multiple industries and advanced knowledge of various database management systems.  
•	Successful project management for multiple database and application migrations and updates with exceptional expertise in Oracle systems. 
•	Experience managing on-site and off-shore consultant teams and vendors.  
•	Detail oriented with strong multi-tasking abilities, effective in independent operations and team dynamics with excellent interpersonal and communication skills.  
•	Experience evaluating and suggesting of new technologies to higher management (evaluated Oracle Exadata, Oracle Supercluster, Oracle cloud, Amazon Cloud, and IBM Softlayer) 
•	Hands-on technical experience with variety of technologies such as relational databases , Oracle applications, Major operating systems , replication technologies and monitoring tools.(Oracle 12c, 11g RAC, 11g, 10g, 9i, Oracle Dataguard (all versions), SQL Server, Oracle RAC, Oracle Dataguard, Oracle E-Business Suite, PeopleSoft, Oracle Golden Gates, Oracle Streams, Materialized Views, Oracle Enterprise Manager 12c, Oracle Enterprise Manager 10g) Summary •	IT Manager with technical experience in multiple industries and advanced knowledge of various database management systems.

•	Hands-on technical experience with variety of technologies such as relational databases , Oracle applications, Major operating systems , replication technologies and monitoring tools.(Oracle 12c, 11g RAC, 11g, 10g, 9i, Oracle Dataguard (all versions), SQL Server, Oracle RAC, Oracle Dataguard, Oracle E-Business Suite, PeopleSoft, Oracle Golden Gates, Oracle Streams, Materialized Views, Oracle Enterprise Manager 12c, Oracle Enterprise Manager 10g) Experience Systems Engineering Manager Shire Pharmaceuticals October 2014  – Present (11 months) Wayne, Pennsylvania •Work directly with Head of System Infrastructure, Database Architect and Database Service Manager and Database Administrators to interpret and transform the database strategies, roadmaps and project-specific high-level database designs into high performing, highly reliable and available detailed database designs.  
•Manage the continual improvement of the database environment design to promote operational excellence and performance requirements of the business systems supported by the database environment. 
• Supervise Database and Compute operations teams to ensure the standards, practices, documentation and training are appropriate to support the operational environment. 
•Directly supervise in-house and off-shore Oracle and SQL server DBA team.  
•Contribute database engineering perspective and guidance in reviews of new application proposals and all database migration initiatives.  
Formulates short- and long-term improvement plans for database systems.  
•Manage multiple projects simultaneously with aggressive deadlines. 
•Maintain technical currency by studying emerging database technologies and uses in similar industrial settings. Summary Certified Expert (OCE) in Oracle 11G R2 RAC,Grid Infrastructure Administration & also in Oracle 11G Performance Tuning. Oracle Certified Professional (OCP) in Oracle 11G & 10G DBA over 16 Years of IT experience out of which more than 10+ years in Database Administration including expertise in database design, database upgrade, Data Guard Implementation (Disaster Recovery ) , Enterprise Grid Implementation, Expertise on Real Application Cluster Maintain/Troubleshoot &Implementation ,Expertise On Database Availability Using RMAN, & SQL Backtrack, Database Patching, Installation of Oracle Binary & RAC System . Experience handling database of very large size of about 100TB in different Unix cluster/stand alone flavour (HP-UX,Linux,AIX, Sun) in very strict SLA. Also good exposure to Database Performance Tuning. Currently handing team size of 16 Member in 24/7 working environment . 
 
Specialties: 	 
Oracle 9i,10G/11G,12C Internals 
Real Application Clusters (RAC) & Various Unix Flavour OS Cluster  
Performance Tuning / DB Patch Management 
Oracle Data Guard  
Disaster Recovery Solutions 
Database Design/ DB Up-gradation 
Recovery Manager (RMAN) 
Oracle Enterprise Grid Control/ OEM 
Oracle Golden gate 
Preparation Of RCA,Expertise Experience in Change Management Process

 Experience Lead Oracle Database Administrator IBM India Pvt. Ltd. July 2013  – Present (2 years 2 months) Bangalore, India Support 850 Plus Oracle DB in very strict SLA in 24/7 environment for Telecom Industry of size 10g to few hundred TB on Various Unix Flavour Cluster & Stand Alone Environment. Handing Team Size of 16 Member in 24/7 Working Environment. 
Support production oracle database services to ensure the highest standards of availability resilience, integrity, security and performance required by client business. 
Good Understanding and working exposure on Oracle Grid, ASM and RAC & Different Unix Flavour OS Cluster (HP,AIX,Solaris & Linux) For Databases. 
Installation,configuration and maintaination of Oracle Standalone and Clustered databases• 
Administration, performance monitoring, tuning, reporting, and root cause analysis 
Good Understanding of SHELL scripts. 
Management, Implement, maintain database design, creation, backups and recovery using RMAN & SQL Back Track. 
Handling Installation, upgrades, migrations and maintenance of databases - including patching and able to manage the Oracle Database environments for multiple applications (Oracle and Non-Oracle). 
Provide Assistance with High availability and Disaster recovery setup, Database Health Checks and optimization, Monitoring and management setup/configuration, Database and applications security, as well as Backup and recovery. 
Handling A Team Of 16 Memeber in 24/7 Working Environment & also able to work as Independent Resource 
Knoweldge with Oracle on Windows & Golden Gate replication. 
 DATABASE ADMINISTRATOR Zamil Offshore Services Co April 2005  –  June 2013  (8 years 3 months) Dammam, KSA Oracle Certified Professional (OCP) Oracle 11G & Oracle 10g and Oracle Certified Expert (OCE) in 11G RAC & Grid Infrastructer Administration with over 14 Years of IT experience out of which more than 6 years in Database Administration including database design, database upgrade, Data Guard Implementation , Enterprise Grid Implementation, maintenance, system analyzing, and about 5 years in development of Client/Server, Multi tier business applications using Oracle with Developer/2000, Oracle 9i Forms & Report Developer & Oracle 10G Forms & Reports Developer, SQL Server, Visual basic. •Configuration, installation, up gradation and maintenance of oracle databases, which include database and file system object and processes in both Linux and Windows. 
 
•Execute database software installation, database creations/configuration and loads. 
•Installation, configuration and tuning of the operating systems for Oracle database.  
•Perform upgrades and patching to Oracle Databases. 
•Support, backup/ recovery, cloning, performance monitoring and tuning of database.  
•Also provide Support to the application developers who customize and support the individual application modules and maintains all database required for development and testing.  
•Provide emergency database support in 24x7. 
•Performs ongoing tuning of the database instances and Bottlenecks Performance and Tuning. 
•Implementation Of Enterprise Grid Computing, Automated Storage System Management (ASM). 
•Communicating with application vendor to solve the issue on database etc.

January 2002  –  March 2005  (3 years 3 months) Saudi Arabia (Al-Khobar) Analyzes user requirements, procedures, and problems to automate processing or to improve existing computer system by performing the following duties:  
Confers with personnel of organizational units involved to analyze current operational procedures, identify problems, and learn specific input and output requirements such as forms of data input, how data is to be summarized, and formats for reports.  
Writes detailed description of user needs, program functions, and steps required to develop or modify computer program.  
Reviews computer system capabilities, workflow, and scheduling limitations to determine if requested program or program change is possible within existing system.  
Studies existing information processing systems to evaluate effectiveness and develops new systems to improve production or workflow as required.  
Prepares workflow charts and diagrams to specify in detail operations to be performed by equipment and computer programs and operations to be performed by personnel in system.  
Conducts studies pertaining to development of new information systems to meet current and projected needs.  
Plans and prepares technical reports, memoranda, and instructional manuals as documentation of program development.  
Upgrades system and corrects errors to maintain system after implementation.

Prepares time and cost estimates for completing projects.
